title: Cooldown pings
body: My cooldown pings aren't working at all,  I tried removing everything that had ALT binds, tried smart cast, normal binds, smart cast with indicators, removed quick pings.  I'm at a complete lost.  Any ideas would help before I uninstall and do a clean install.

replies.body: My ping button is set to Ctrl, not Alt (I don't remember if that is default or not). I can't think of any advice, but if you do resort to a reinstall I suggest first refreshing your settings to default first by deleting your **Config** folder and starting a Custom match. Second, try a client repair, as it will be much faster than a reinstall. Reinstalling takes too long so you want that to be your last resort; you may also use the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to do that (it will assist with a proper clean reinstall, among other things).

ok so I did more digging in the files and I found out how the cooldown pings work, they work off the quick alert & quick retreat ping binds if anyone wants to rebind them, and I also fixed my issue I had attack move bound to my left mouse button which did not allow the quick ping to work right as it was just getting attack move and not the normal left click but thx for all the help I guess I will have to live without attack move on my left mouse button for now..
Try the g key, some players have g key automatically set for some reason. If not then be sure to look in settings to see if you can change the hotkey (if there even is one yet)

The cooldown pings should be set to the Alt Key, and it might be a reserved key. If resetting your bindings to default or DTN's suggestion doesn't resolve this, then there might be an issues with your game files.  Hit up our tech team to look into this by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they should be able to help out.  We will reply to your ticket asap!
